item.title: Creating a clean presentation style in 40 commits
item.description: Did you always want to learn ConTeXt, but did not know where to start? I have written a git-based tutorial that should help you get started. The idea of the tutorial is to start with an empty document, and add features one-by-one. Each git commit corresponds to one small change in the document, and includes pointers to the documentation corresponding to that change. Read Use this tutorial as follows: Clone the git repository:
